author: The Telegraph
title: The best carry-on suitcases for business travellers
text: As every experienced business traveller knows, carry-on luggage can save precious seconds on arrival, especially when you’re pushed for time. Fortunately, finding something that not only fits the regulation size, but keeps your clothing and other belongings in order needn’t mean scrimping on substance or style. 1. Chepstow by Knomo The Chepstow (main picture) features two main compartments: one for a laptop and another with elasticated pockets for clothes. It is made from a soft and super-lightweight nylon that is both water and dirt resistant. RRP: £219 Visit: www.knomobags.com/uk 2. Thule Crossover Carry-On Roller or backpack? Now you can have both. The padded top-load pouch holds a PC while the backpack straps permit quick and easy shoulder carrying. For extra comfort the wheels cleverly face away from the body when it’s used as a backpack. RRP: £249.99 Visit: www.thule.com/en/gb 3. Ermenegildo Zegna Printed Leather Carry-On Trolley Bag Elegantly understated but highly practical, this scratch-resistant calfskin bag features the sophisticated, clean lines that you’d expect from the well-known Italian menswear brand. There are top and side handles and a generous open space inside. RRP: £1,405 Visit: www.zegna.com 4. Trakke Findo Backpack Trakke produces handmade bags to order at its workshop in Glasgow, using durable waxed cotton. Inspired by boy-scouts backpacks of the Fifties, the Findo has leather straps that mould to your shoulders over time and side pockets for that bottle of well-earned duty free. RRP: £195 Visit: www.trakke.co.uk 5. Montegrappa Famous for its beautifully made pens, Montegrappa also has a range of leather goods. This trolley cabin bag in calf leather has an ergonomic net-cut handle, a deep front pocket with metal zip and piping and details in contrasting colours. RRP: £1,340 Visit: www.montegrappa.com 6. Taunton Weekend Holdall by Oliver Sweeney Based on a vintage doctor’s bag, this slightly retro offering from the quirkily hip British menswear brand Oliver Sweeney is fitted with a multitude of practical pockets, including an extendable section for shoes, and is crafted from richly polished, vegetable-tanned calf leather. RRP: £495 Visit: www.oliversweeney.com 7. The Diplomat by Steamline [Main image, above] Steamline create luxurious, vintage-inspired luggage for business and pleasure. The Diplomat, features a robust metal frame, a recycled leather body and traditional cow leather straps alongside that very modern feature – TSA-approved locks. RRP: £384 Visit: www.steamlineluggage.com 8. Victorinox Spectra Wheel Hand Luggage Despite its look of solid impregnability, this polycarbonate wheelie case is easily manoeuvrable thanks to dual caster wheels. The Swiss Tracker™ Bag Tracking Program will reunite you with your bag for free worldwide. RRP: £314.99 Available through www.surfdome.com • Find out more about how your company can make savings on business travel by visiting British Airways On Business
